applyTo: "*.html,*.css,*.js"
---

## Frontend Guidelines
- Use accessibility attributes (alt text, aria labels) and ensure sufficient color contrast ratios (WCAG 2.1 AA: minimum 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text and UI components/graphical objects).
- Use responsive design for compatibility with mobile devices.
- Validate HTML structure and semantic elements
